{
  "name": "{{quizName}}",
  "totalScore": 18,
  "passingPercentage": 75,
  "showStopperQuestion": 1,
  "questions": [
    {
      "type": "TEXTUAL",
      "question": "What is your name?",
      "score": 5
    },
    {
      "type": "SINGLE_CHOICE",
      "question": "Which city is city largest in California?",
      "score": 7,
      "answer": 2,
      "hasOtherOption": false,
      "options": [
        "San Francisco",

      "answers": [
        0,
        1,
        2
      ],
      "hasOtherOption": true,
      "options": [
        "Steve Jobs",
        "Steve Wozniak",
        "Ronald Wayne",
        "Ronald Reagan"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
